parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided text.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions the PSD (Partidul Social Democrat) and encourages voting for them, referencing their position on the ballot (position 2).  The image further reinforces this by displaying the PSD logo and ballot information.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed for wide public reach. The message is not a private communication but aims to influence a large number of voters.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The primary objective of the post is to persuade voters to choose the PSD in the upcoming parliamentary elections.  Phrases like "Votează pe 1 Decembrie," "Calea sigură pentru Suceava," and the emphasis on the PSD's role in ensuring stability clearly indicate an intention to influence the election outcome.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While the post presents some political commentary, it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic work. It's primarily promotional material advocating for a specific party.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post is not expressing a personal opinion; it's a clear and direct appeal for votes for the PSD. The author's affiliation with the PSD is explicitly stated, further solidifying the promotional nature of the content.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>489518217471492</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, with its explicit endorsement of the PSD and call to vote for them, constitutes electoral propaganda.  The post directly targets the parliamentary elections, urging voters to support the PSD. The use of persuasive language, visual aids (the image), and the paid advertisement format all contribute to its classification as electoral propaganda.  The post's objective is clearly to influence voters' choices in the election.  While the post mentions broader political themes (stability, development), these are used instrumentally to promote the PSD.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>PSD</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PSD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Adrian Tărcă, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID 489518217471492) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care constituie propagandă electorală pentru PSD, îndemnând la vot pentru acest partid și prezentând argumente persuasive în favoarea acestuia, cu scopul clar de a influența rezultatul alegerilor parlamentare. Postarea, vizibilă publicului larg prin intermediul unei reclame plătite pe Facebook, conține imagini și text care promovează PSD, inclusiv referirea la poziția lor pe buletinul de vot.  Această acțiune este interzisă de lege, întrucât constituie propagandă electorală după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
